snippet.title: Overwatch 2 x Cowboy Bebop | Collaboration Trailer
snippet.description:
Ready for some bounty hunting?

From the iconic music to the space western aesthetic, celebrate the legendary crew of the Bebop when Overwatch 2 x Cowboy Bebop arrives in-game on Mar 12.

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!

“TANK!” Composed and Arranged by Yoko Kanno
Copyright 1998 Bandai Namco Music Live Inc
This video is published under the permission of Bandai Namco Music Live Inc.
_
